column2: plot1 <- ggplot(dat2plot, aes(x=validity, y=mean_RT, fill=validity, color = validity)) +
stat_summary(fun=mean, aes(ymin=..y.., ymax=..y.., color =validity), geom='errorbar', width=0.9, size=1.5) +
plot2 <- ggplot(dat2plot, aes(x=validity, y=mean_RT, fill=validity, color = validity)) +
stat_summary(fun=mean, aes(ymin=..y.., ymax=..y.., color =validity), geom='errorbar', width=0.9, size=1.5) +
plot3 <- ggplot(dat_plot, aes(y = mean_RT, fill = validity, x = 1)) +
adjust = 1.3, trim = FALSE, alpha = 1, colour = NA)+
plotttitle <- ggdraw() + draw_label("RT in ms", fontface='bold')
plotplots <- ggarrange(plot1, plot2, plot3, ncol = 3,common.legend = TRUE,align = "h", widths=c(2,2,1))
